use: Used in: Blacksmithing (shield, weapon), Cooking (potion, tonic), Enchanting (enchant_misc, jewelry_ring).

name: Emberstone Chunk (T1)
description: Heat-bearing stone used to temper metal and fire-ward engravings
use: Used in: Blacksmithing (shield, weapon), Cooking (potion), Enchanting (enchant_misc, jewelry_ring).

name: Frostsalt Crystal (T1)
description: Cold salt crystal for preservation and chill-ward mixtures
use: Used in: Blacksmithing (weapon, shield), Cooking (potion, food_misc), Enchanting (enchant_misc).

name: Starcut Gem (T1)
description: Faceted gem that holds clean arcane edges and spell focus
use: Used in: Blacksmithing (weapon, shield), Cooking (potion, food_misc), Enchanting (enchant_misc, focus_wand).

name: Forge Flux (T1)
description: Refining powder that improves metal bonds and strong stitching rivets
use: Used in: Blacksmithing (shield, weapon), Cooking (potion), Enchanting (enchant_misc, jewelry_ring).

name: Primal Shard (T1)
description: Volatile shard that amplifies enchantments when seated correctly
use: Used in: Blacksmithing (weapon, shield), Cooking (potion), Enchanting (enchant_misc).

name: Mythic Alloy (T1)
description: Rare alloy for truly exceptional arms, armor, and magical bases
use: Used in: Blacksmithing (weapon, shield), Cooking (potion, food_misc), Enchanting (enchant_misc).

name: Aether Sand (T1)
description: Fine sand that clings to spellwork and accepts ink readily
use: Used in: Enchanting (enchant_misc), Scribing (script_misc, map_arcane), Tailoring (boots, cloak, belt), Woodcrafter (wood_misc).

name: Mana Thread (T1)
description: Filament of raw mana used to stitch effects into cloth or metal
use: Used in: Enchanting (enchant_misc, jewelry_ring), Scribing (scroll_spell, script_misc), Tailoring (belt), Woodcrafter (instrument, staff_nonmagic).

name: Rift Glass (T1)
description: Shimmering glass acting as a conduit for wards and lenses
use: Used in: Enchanting (enchant_misc), Scribing (script_misc, scroll_spell), Tailoring (headwear, cloak, armor), Woodcrafter (staff_magic, instrument).

name: Spell Soot (T1)
description: Residue from spent spells used to darken, stabilize, and fix inks
use: Used in: Enchanting (enchant_misc), Scribing (scroll_spell, script_misc), Tailoring (belt, tailor_misc), Woodcrafter (staff_magic, wood_misc).

name: Luminous Pearl (T1)
description: Bright pearl used in charms, foci, and scepter inlays
use: Used in: Enchanting (enchant_misc), Scribing (script_misc), Tailoring (headwear), Woodcrafter (staff_magic, staff_nonmagic).

name: Void Essence (T1)
description: Rare essence that bites into reality and hardens protective scripts
use: Used in: Enchanting (enchant_misc, jewelry_ring), Scribing (script_misc), Tailoring (cloak, headwear), Woodcrafter (instrument, staff_nonmagic).
